A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: why so much hate from the general public? I don't understand. I was born in 1979 and watched my first movie of the series in around 1983. I am a die hard fan. Yes there are a few elements that werent great\, but this can be said of all of the movies in the series including ESB. This is a beautiful movie\, stunning. It includes some of the greatest moments in any of the movies. Ignore the haters. This is an amazing film\, better than TFA and almost equal to the ESB. Enjoy
